original_text: Besides the great number of burnt offerings, there was the fat of the peace offerings, and there were the drink offerings for the burnt offerings. Thus the service of the house of the Lord was restored.
korean_text: 번제와 화목제의 기름과 각 번제에 속한 전제들이 많더라 이와 같이 여호와의 전에서 섬기는 일이 순서대로 갖추어지니라

sentences.original_text: Besides the great number of burnt offerings,
there was the fat of the peace offerings,
and there were the drink offerings for the burnt offerings.
Thus the service of the house of the Lord was restored.
sentences.korean_translation: 이와 같이 여호와의 집 섬기는 일이 회복되었습니다.
